original_text: They removed the altars in Jerusalem and cleared away the incense altars and threw them into the Kidron Valley.
korean_text: 무리가 일어나 예루살렘에 있는 제단과 향단들을 모두 제거하여 기드론 시내에 던지고

sentences.original_text: They removed the altars in Jerusalem
and cleared away the incense altars
and threw them into the Kidron Valley
